attributes.action: approve a redesign of the logo announced today for the London 2012 Olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo released today is uninspiring and  resembles graffiti. Before he leaves, the Prime Minister should commission a new and improved version that people of London will be proud of.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
